app.name: WUP Installer GX2 mod
app.long_description:
This application can install public titles such as games, game updates or DLC to your system memory (NAND) or the WiiU formatted USB. This application is based on "WUP Installer y Mod" by Yardape and the GUI from "Loadiine GX2" sources.
This version work from HBL and HBL channel.
NOTE : BE CARREFULL WITH THE USE OF THIS MODIFIED VERSION , it will allow the installation of system updates.
Thanks to: Loadiine GX2 team for GUI sources. Yardape for installer sources.
